Sentencas: Chromium evaporation barriers are frequently used in solid oxide fuel cells to protect the porous cathode from chromium poisoning.
Titulo: Aging of atmospherically plasma sprayed chromium evaporation barriers

Sentencas: Volatile chromium species are generated at the operation temperature of about 600-900 degrees C in a humid atmosphere for chromia scale forming steels as interconnect materials.
Titulo: Aging of atmospherically plasma sprayed chromium evaporation barriers

Sentencas: In order to reduce this effect, barrier coatings are applied, often by atmospheric plasma spraying.
Titulo: Aging of atmospherically plasma sprayed chromium evaporation barriers

Sentencas: However, also in these coatings microstructural changes as densification and in parallel formation of large pores have been observed.
Titulo: Aging of atmospherically plasma sprayed chromium evaporation barriers

Sentencas: In order to clarify these mechanisms plasma sprayed Mn-1.0 Co(1.9)Fe(0.1)O4 (MCF) are deposited on ferritic steels and furthermore coated with a perovskite based contact layer as used in stack build-up.
Titulo: Aging of atmospherically plasma sprayed chromium evaporation barriers

Sentencas: These coatings are annealed in air up to 1000 h and the microstructural changes and bending of the samples are studied.
Titulo: Aging of atmospherically plasma sprayed chromium evaporation barriers

Sentencas: The results show increasing bending with increasing aging time.
Titulo: Aging of atmospherically plasma sprayed chromium evaporation barriers

Sentencas: High temperature curvature measurements indicate that the amount of bending is not significantly dependent on temperature.
Titulo: Aging of atmospherically plasma sprayed chromium evaporation barriers

Sentencas: As an explanation the creep deformation of the substrate/coating system at high temperatures due to compressive stress levels in the coating is given.
Titulo: Aging of atmospherically plasma sprayed chromium evaporation barriers

Sentencas: The origin of the stress is related to phase changes in combination with the oxidation of the coatings.
Titulo: Aging of atmospherically plasma sprayed chromium evaporation barriers

Sentencas: In addition, interdiffusion and densification processes are discussed.
Titulo: Aging of atmospherically plasma sprayed chromium evaporation barriers
